name: MasThink
overview:
MasThink (+Think) is an Irvine, California based management consulting firm that provides finance and operational leadership for small and midsize organizations.

Our firm’s mission is to build on our reputation as a recognized leader in performance consulting and problem solving capabilities.

MasThink’s strategic, value-based approach enables our customers to optimize their workplace operations in support of their business goals.

We strive to grow long term relationships based on respect, integrity and mutual trust.
